response.overview: Thorn Crown is a film. It features Jesus Christ and a different people experiencing the life of Jesus in the spirit. It starts of in an apartment when the young man has visions of the son of God and people he knew in the scripture. In the story the spirit makes him have invisible whiplashes on his back during Jesus trial but before the visions crown of thorns. When he moves to his former home the decapitating feeling of John and the a damaged leg held with metal joining when he fell three stories escaping sounds. Finally the damaged legs of the two thieves crucified by Jesus on the cross.  Director - Solomon I Ubani
response.title: Untold Story of Two Worlds
